content: i designed this versatile ornament that can be made to have a variety of different looks create a snowman cup or christmas cup with a snowflake create a number of looks just by changing the yarn color or adding different embellishments this pattern is written in american standard terms size 2 ¾ tall x 2 ¼ wide worsted weight yarn in red brown white blue and orange black white embroidery thread optional 6 mm safety eyes carrot nose button snowflake button stitch marker yarn needle fiberfill ornament hangers size g 4 00 mm crochet hook pattern stitches st - stitch single_crochet - single_crochet decrease - single_crochet 2 together increase - single_crochet twice in the same st blo - back loop only flo - front loop only special stitches mc magic_ring for more patterns from me check out my blog https //mycreativeblog com/ 1 1 https //mycreativeblog com/
